creator: Musicli
descriptionHtml:
No Ads.

VI Voice Recorder helps you record important moments with ease.

VI Voice Recorder makes voice recording more accessible than ever. Capture meetings, personal notes, classes, songs, sleep talking :) or anything else, without time limits!

Why choose VI Voice Recorder?
★ Record to high-quality PCM (wav) and AAC (m4a/mp4), or use AMR(3gp) to save space.
★ Adjustable sample rate from phone quality (8 kHz) up to Highest quality (48 kHz).
★ Quickly start a new recording with shortcuts, and record in the background.
★ Share recordings easily through email or your favorite app, or set one of them as a ringtone.
★ Live audio spectrum analyzer.
★ Selectable audio source (microphones or phone call).

Easy and Powerful Voice Recorder
- Changeable bitrate from 32 up to 320 kbps.
- Support for stereo and mono recording.
- Open with option allows you to play and edit sounds in other apps.
- Built-in user-friendly media player with volume control exactly like in a regular mp3 player.
- Speed up or slow down playback.
- Control the recorder from anywhere using the notifications bar.
- Bonus features: rename and delete your recordings, bookmark files, sort files, and more.

NOTE: Please note that VI Voice Recorder is not dedicated call recorder and may not work properly on some devices.

Thanks for downloading VI Voice Recorder. If there are any problems, please contact us via email. We are always happy to assist you.

Email us at: vivoicerecorder.feedback@gmail.com

Disclaimer:
* VI Voice Recorder is not affiliated with any social media platforms.
* Voice recording features are offered for non-commercial and personal use only.
* Users shall be solely responsible for any intellectual property infringement arising from the recording.
* VI Voice Recorder will never collect personal data from users without permission. All the recorded files are saved locally on your device. They cannot be accessed by us or by any third party.
